text: Te'omra sampradayara ahankarai netasakale se'i sampradayara yisakale imana anichila- yisakalaka durbala buli bharaa haichila te'omlokaka ka’le, ‘tomaloke janane ye, chaleha te'omra pratipalakara taraphara paraa praeraita? Te'omloke (uttarata) ka’le, ‘niscaya te'om yi lai praeraita haiche, ami tara oparata bisbasi’
